segments.text: Julia , what do you think of the network ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Network is omnipresent nowadays . It's quite convenient for people . You see , we can download music and information from the Internet ; I can study from it , too . And the most of all , we can compose , send , and receive e-mails .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , you are right . Internet makes our lives easier . But it's a two-blade sword .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I mean Internet brings benefit a lot , but also some disadvantages . For example , many youngsters are addicted to the games and they neglect their study ; or some bad guys steal people's money online , etc .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree . But I think although it has some negative effects , on the whole Internet does more good to us than harm .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , you are right . But we have to know how to make good use of it .
segments.speaker: S1
